error.farmnamenotfound: Current farm name "{{FarmName}}" not found in config file!
error.creatingconfigentry: Creating a new config entry for the current farm.
command.togglecrib.description:
Enables or disables a player's crib.

 Usage: {{CommandName}} <PlayerName>
 PlayerName - The player who needs the crib toggling
command.togglebed.description:
Enables or disables a player's beds.

 Usage: {{CommandName}} <PlayerName> [side]
 PlayerName - The player who needs the bed toggling
 side - left or right (optional)
